name: Bogs Patch Ankle Rain Boots - Women's
description: Slip on these boots for a rainy afternoon walk. Bogs added the features of their popular rainboots to this stylish ankle-high option. Large ergonomic handles make them easy to get on, and an integrated heel kick make them easy to slip off.Soft, 100% waterproof rubber upper with large handles to pull them on even while wearing gloves or mitts.Bogs Max-Wick™ pulls moisture away from the foot and DuraFresh™ helps naturally control odours.Removeable, contoured EVA footbed provide all-day comfort.Built-in heel kick allows for easy hands free removal.Non-marking rubber outsole keeps things under control.
